'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.3''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on September 16, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/261|title=Release 1.1.3 (1.21.120.22)|website=GitHub|date=September 16, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/39606021304589-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-120-22|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.120.22|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=September 16, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* A preview thumbnail of a structure is added to the structure list item.
* Added undo/redo support for Ruler Tool.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue with client hanging when copy/pasting large structures.
